alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fall River County through 345 PM MDT... At 310 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Oral, or 11 miles southeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oral, Oelrichs, Smithwick and Hay Canyon Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
